name: SACRED HEART - Xylography #02
description:
In the interior of northeastern Brazil it is common to arrive at homes and find a portrait or photo of the Sacred Heart. It represents the faith that the residents have in Christ.
They say that Jesus was a great sage, beyond the words registered in the holy books. A philosopher and a connoisseur of alchemy. Were the miracles the fruit of this knowledge?

Digital art inspired by Xylography.

Purchase for personal use only. For commercial use, please contact Mohzah Nascimento.
